wikipedia_page.main: John Ernest Bode (13 February 1816 – 6 October 1874) was an Anglican priest, educator, poet, and hymnist.

response: * 1855 – John Ernest Bode The Absence of Precision in the Formularies of the Church of England

The medieval tower collapsed in 1850, with a replacement completed in 1851. Extensive refurbishment continued through the 19th century. John Ernest Bode was rector of the parish in the mid-19th century, and is known for writing the hymn "O Jesus I have Promised". He is buried in the church yard.All Saints Church
* John Ernest Bode (1816–1874), English Anglican priest
